children.name: Custom

config.customHeadCode:
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:400,700" rel="stylesheet">

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/moment.js/2.11.2/moment.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/moment-timezone/0.5.0/moment-timezone-with-data.min.js"></script>

<style> 

/*.discoverResults {
    display: none;
}*/

.background_row {
    background-image: url('https://trylivetiles.sharepoint.com/sites/workplace4273/SiteAssets/pattern-line.svg');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: right;
} 

.LT_global_Nav {
    margin-top: 21px;
}

.sites_row {
    display: none;
}

body{  
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;  
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;  
}  

/*=== Utility classes ===*/ 

.float-nav-right .lt-bar-nav-menu:after {  
    display: block;  
    content: "";  
    clear: both;  
}  

.float-nav-right .lt-bar-nav-menu ul.lt-root-list {  
    float: right;  
}  

.centered-nav .lt-bar-nav-menu {  
    text-align: center;  
}  

.drop-shadow {  
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);  
    -moz-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);  
    box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);  
}  
 
.no-margin-bottom{  
    margin-bottom:0;  
}  

.no-margin-bottom .lt-responsive-item{  
    margin-bottom:0;  
}  

.rounded-corner {  
    border-radius: 3px;  
}   

.lt-embed-tile {  
    border: none;  
}

/* Vertical articles */

.vertical_article .lt-title {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.vertical_article .lt-simple-news-item .lt-timestamp {
    float: none !important;
    display: block !important;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* Carousel */


card {
  will-change: transform;
  margin: 8px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}

.lt-news-list-slide {
    position: relative;
}

.lt-news-list-image {
    height: 100%;
    width: 66%;
    right: 34%;
    position: absolute;
}

.lt-news-list-title {margin-bottom: 20px;}

.lt-news-list-modified {margin-bottom: 10px;}

.lt-news-list-content {
    height: 100%;
    width: 32%;
    position: absolute;
    right: 2%;
    padding: 30px 40px 0 30px;
}

.lt-slick-prev, .lt-slick-next {
    top: 50% !important;
    font-size: 1.8em;
}

.lt-slick-prev:hover, .lt-slick-next:hover {
    font-size: 1.8em;
    color: rgb(97, 59, 144);
}

.slick-dots {
    left: 40px;
    bottom: 20px;
    top: initial !important;
    right: initial !important;
}

/* End Carousel */


</style>
